code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Recommended.css';import{API_KEY,value_converter}from'../../data';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Recommended=_ref=>{let{categoryId}=_ref;const[apiData,setApiData]=useState([]);const relatedVideo_API="https://youtube.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/videos?part=snippet%2CcontentDetails%2Cstatistics&chart=mostPopular&maxResults=46&regionCode=IN&videoCategoryId=".concat(categoryId,"&key=").concat(API_KEY);useEffect(()=>{fetch(relatedVideo_API).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setApiData(data.items));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recommended",children:apiData.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"side-video-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/video/".concat(item.snippet.categoryId,"/").concat(item.id),onClick:()=>window.scrollTo(0,0),className:"small-thumbnail",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.snippet.thumbnails.medium.url,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"vid-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.snippet.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.snippet.channelTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"recommended-views",children:[value_converter(item.statistics.viewCount)," Views"]})]})]},index);})});};export default Recommended;
